name: Mango Beet Spiced Cooler
description: Mango Beet Spiced Cooler. A delicious, refreshing and fruity cooler made with fresh mango, beets mint, cumin and honey. Vegan and Gluten Free Recipe.
recipeIngredient: 8-10  mint leaves (or dry mint or basil to taste)
1/4 teaspoon rock salt (kala namak or 1 Tablespoon lemon juice)

recipeInstructions.text: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, add beet, peeled chopped mango, mint leaves, salt, sugar, rock salt or lemon juice, cumin powder, and water enough to cover the fruit.
recipeInstructions.name: In a pressure cooker or a deep pan, add beet, peeled chopped mango, mint leaves, salt, sugar, rock salt or lemon juice, cumin powder, and water enough to cover the fruit.

recipeInstructions.text: Pressure cook for 1 whistle, or boil for 15-20 minutes until mango is soft and cooked.
recipeInstructions.name: Pressure cook for 1 whistle, or boil for 15-20 minutes until mango is soft and cooked.

recipeInstructions.text: Blend the mixture when cool and adjust salt, sugar and rock salt(rock salt adds a nice sour taste).
recipeInstructions.name: Blend the mixture when cool and adjust salt, sugar and rock salt(rock salt adds a nice sour taste).

recipeInstructions.text: Add more or less water according to preference. For super hot days, add more chilled water to get a watery version... quick rehydration! Keep it thick and smoothie like for a filling breakfast!
recipeInstructions.name: Add more or less water according to preference. For super hot days, add more chilled water to get a watery version... quick rehydration! Keep it thick and smoothie like for a filling breakfast!

recipeInstructions.text: Serve chilled topped with fresh mint leaves! Or add a splash of your favorite liquor !
